verses.1: Tua bangin Topaʼ biakinn ding a hih nasep khempeuh kizo hi. Tua ciangin a pa David in a ap sa nate Solomon in paipihin, Pasianʼ biakinn sung van manpha koihnate sungah a ngunte, a khamte le umlebeel khempeuh a seng hi.
verses.2: Tua ciangin Zion a kici David khuapi sung panin Topaʼ Thuciamna Singkuang a paipih to dingin Kumpi Solomon in Israel upate, minam lutang khempeuh le Israel beh makaite, Jerusalem ah kaikhawm hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin a kha sagihna-a pawi hun sungin kumpipaʼ mai ah Israel mi khempeuh kikhawm uh hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, Levi mite in Thuciamna Singkuang la uh hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin amaute in Thuciamna Singkuang le kikhopna buk le puanbuk sunga om a siangtho umlebeel khempeuh pua to uh a, siampite le Levi mite in tuate pua to uh hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon le ama mai ah a kikhawm Israel-te khempeuh Thuciamna Singkuang mai ah om uh a, biakna-in tuu le bawngtal tampi tak pia uh ahih manin a phazah kisim zo lo hi.
verses.7: Tua ahih ciangin siampite in kherub-teʼ kha nuai, siangtho pen mun sung, biakinn sung nung sung ama munah Topaʼ Thuciamna Singkuang a paipih uh hi.
verses.8: Kherub-te in Thuciamna Singkuang tungah a khate uh zak uh ahih manin kherub-te pen Thuciamna Singkuang le a zawlte tungah khuhna khat a suak uh hi.
verses.9: A zawlte sau ahih manin siangtho mun panin biakinn sung nung mai ah a mongte kidawk a, ahih hangin a pualam panin kimu thei lo hi; tu ni dongin tua lai ah tuate om hi.
verses.10: Egypt panin amaute hong paikhiat lai-in Topa in Israel mite tawh thuciamna a bawlna mun Horeb ah Moses in suangpek nihte a koih sim loh Thuciamna Singkuang sungah bangmah dang om lo hi.
verses.11: Siangtho mun panin siampite hong pusuakin (bang hang hiam cih leh amauʼ pawlte cih tuam om loin tua lai-a om siampite khempeuh amau mahmah kisiansuah uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin Levi mi lasate Asaf, Heman le Jeduthun, amauʼ tapate le a behte, saihadial puan tawh kizemin, daltuahte, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate tawi-in peengkul tum siampite za le sawm nih tawh biakna tau nisuahna lamah ding khawm uh hi.
verses.13: Aw kikhatin phatin Topaʼ tungah lungdam koh ding pen peengkul tumte le lasateʼ nasep ahi hi) peengkulte le daltuahte le a dang lasaknate tawh, “ Topaʼ tungah lungdam koh ding hoih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi,” ci-in Topa phatna-in la a kisak ciangin, Topaʼ biakinn sung meii tawh kidim a,
verses.14: meii hangin siampite in na sem zo lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topaʼ minthanna vang taang Pasianʼ biakinn sung a dim hi.
